// Keep keys in alphabetical order and b: This provides for quicker lookup of addon information.
author: anaran
description:
★ Try the Issue Pigeon "Fly" menu entry after selecting some broken links or text errors.
The Issue Pigeon might just find its way home.

★ Report issues for supported sites, based on content extracted from text selections in webpages.

★ Uset the "Settings" menu entry instead of inline options. It works on Android too.
name: issue-pigeon
title: Issue Pigeon

preferences.description: Issue Pigeon loading into newly opened tabs can be disabled, immediate, or delayed to when a tab is activated again.
preferences.name: loading
preferences.title: Loading

preferences.description: Diagnostic messages are displayed directly in the current browser tab. This can be useful when the add-on is not working as expected, but will be irritating in regular use.
preferences.name: diagnostics_overlay
preferences.title: Show Diagnostic Messages in Overlay

preferences.description: This preference shall be hidden, except for debug purposes. It is changed by the user dragging the icon into place.
preferences.name: position
preferences.title: Icon Positioning

preferences.description: User-defined extensions to known sites. By turning on "Show Diagnostic Messages in Overlay" you can copy/paste one of the definitions under the "known" field here and edit it for your needs.
preferences.name: KNOWN_SITES_EXTENSIONS
preferences.title: User-defined extensions to known sites

preferences.description: Controls the amount of logging to the browser console by level, from all to errors only to nothing at all. Increase the log level when investigating problems.
preferences.name: sdk.console.logLevel
preferences.title: Console Logging Level
